page.title: 05CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: During the time they have for {recreation children}play several types of{games}one of which is skipping.In the playground at school,and in the street near home is where it takes place. Usually it is played in the warmer months of Spring and Summer. It is more popular with girls. To play this game or an old washing line. One person or more can play this game. You hold the rope in each hand move your wrists in a circular motion. If you are doing this correctly the rope comes over your head. When the rope nearly reaches your ankles you bring your feet off the floor and jump.
